com.revolsys.jts.operation.buffer

Class DepthSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.jts.operation.buffer.DepthSegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<DepthSegment>

    public class DepthSegment
extends Object
implements Comparable<DepthSegment>
    A segment from a directed edge which has been assigned a depth value for its sides.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(DepthSegment other)
        Defines a comparision operation on DepthSegments which orders them left to right 
         DS1 < DS2   if   DS1.seg is left of DS2.seg
 DS1 > DS2   if   DS1.seg is right of DS2.seg
